data.message: Em you're pathetic. You've been used for propaganda like a tool and you thought it'll get you support from the hood so you can make more money from selling your products by going against your nation. You can't get any lower than that. Going against your president is going against your nation. I don't even care what msg in there coz i see u joined with CNN FAKE NEWS INC. Like any other person you entitled to your own opinion but between this and using your position as a musician as a political propaganda tool that was a dirty move not only against your nation who provided you with the right to vote and freedom but against your followers who provided the food on your table for years and helped bring you to this position that you have used against them. Enjoy your new followers
